programme.title: Swim Neighbors

programme.title: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants, S01E06, Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Gravity, S03E09, LISA pathfinder, has led the way for a space based gravity wave detector, what are gravity waves and why are they so hard to detect?

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Cosmic Collisions, S03E08, Cosmic and x rays, these mysterious and highly powerful particles from deep space are being investigated to finally discover where they come from.

programme.title: The Dark Side
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Dark Side, S02E10, Perhaps that American politician was right. There are indeed things we know we don’t know.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.
MOON SHINE, S05E02, The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: Orbit
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Orbit, S02E03, The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

programme.title: Danger, Astreroids Ahead
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Danger, Astreroids Ahead, S02E07, The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere.

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E05, College student Brad Perry shows up to work his graveyard shift at the gas station and is never seen alive again.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.

programme.title: Are You Ready for Marriage?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E02, A high school senior named Sue and her boyfriend want to get married right after Sue graduates. A marriage counselor discourages the young couple from entering into a hasty marriage.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E11, Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.
MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Men, 19971011000000 +0000, Our heroes discover just how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.
MST3K: Mad Monster, 19891202000000 +0000, Things get hairy on the Satellite of Love thanks to the lupine antics of The Mad Monster (1942) and the second chapter of Radar Men from the Moon (1952).

Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders, 19990917000000 +0000, A grandfather tells his grandson several horrifying stories involving the wizard Merlin and a stolen monkey doll in Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders (1996).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.
MST3K: The Sinister Urge, 19941105000000 +0000, Two laid back detectives crack down on an underground porn ring while Frank threatens to blow up Deep 13.

programme.title: Boggy Creek II: And The Legend Continues
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S11E06, A professor and his students camp out in the rural Arkansas swamp, in hopes of finding a Bigfoot-like creature.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.
MST3K: The Batwoman, 20220819000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).

The Wedding March, 20160625000000 +0000, After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.

Anne Tyler's Saint Maybe, 19981231000000 +0000, The story of a young man seeking forgiveness for his brother's death. Stars Mary Louise Parker and Blythe Danner. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's Heritage Festival gets everyone in town talking.

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. A blizzard threatens disaster in Middleton.

programme.title: Together We Stand...
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. The winter storm continues to pose a threat to all of Middleton.

programme.title: True Colors
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's enchanting "Good Witch" Cassie receives devastating news.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Sam's ex-wife Linda threatens to come between them.

programme.title: Driven
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. The arrival of a man from Cassie's past may complicate her relationship.

programme.title: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: The Trouble with Love
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie feels upset after Grace admits she's been spending more time with Sam.

programme.title: Emancipation
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E04, On the planet Simarka, where the fierce race of Shavadai mistreat females, Capt. Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) challenges their ways in a thrilling battle of wits that may bring women equity or forever keep them as second-class citizens.

programme.title: The Broca Divide
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E05, Returning from a planet with both a civilized and primitive side, all but two of the team become infected and spread a brutal virus. Will Teal'c and Jackson find the cause, or are their colleagues doomed to become Stone Age primitives?

programme.title: Trinity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E06, The team discover the remains of an experiment the Ancients were working on to create the ultimate power generator and McKay believes he can finish what the Ancients started. Teyla and Ronon discover Ronon is not the last of his kind.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E07, Beckett begins experimenting with a new treatment that could turn the Wraiths into humans. The team finds a young Wraith girl, who could be Beckett's first patient. Having been raised by a human, the girl is eager, and reckless, to try anything.

programme.title: Conversion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E08, After being injected with Beckett's Wraith treatment, Sheppard's life is in danger as he slowly is transforming into an Iratus bug hybrid. The team rushes to find a cure and reverse the side effects, but in the end it might be up to Sheppard.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E09, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E10, The team are kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E01, After Colonel Young and his military personnel are captured by the Lucian Alliance, Dannic abandons them on a nearby planet. Meanwhile on the ship, Dr. Rush, Brody, Chloe, and Eli attempt a risky plan to force the Lucians to surrender.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E02, With the need for food and water becoming dire, Dr. Rush manages to find a planet within range that seems viable but can only be accessed by shuttle. When nearing the planet, they encounter violent turbulence and must make a dangerous crash landing.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E03, The Destiny is on a collision course with an ancient ship found floating in space. Panic turns to wonder as the ships dock with each other. The crew discovers that it might hold the key to a connection back to Earth and other hidden secrets.

programme.title: Pathogen
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E04, On Destiny, Chloe's behavior has become a cause of concern and a worried Scott makes a shocking discovery while searching her quarters: a journal with Alien script. He shows it to Young and Rush who decide they must keep a constant eye on Chloe.

programme.title: The First Commandment
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E06, The SG-1 team is sent after the SG-9 team that has failed to return. They find that the team's captain (William Russ), having been treated like a god by planetary inhabitants, is drunk with power and is tyrannizing them. Can they overcome him?

programme.title: Cold Lazarus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E07, A strange crystal strikes down O'Neill, replacing him with a double that returns with the team to Earth to find the cause of O'Neill's private grief...his son's death. But the double is dangerously unstable. Can O'Neill return home to save everyone?

programme.title: The Nox
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E08, When a planned ambush goes disastrously wrong, resulting in fatalities among the SG-1 team, the peace-loving Nox restore them to life. But while these gentle people can bring back the dead, can they resist the deadly technology of the Goa'uld?

programme.title: And Don't Forget to Give Me Back My Black T-Shirt
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E23, Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.

programme.title: Love Is Blind
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E24, Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

programme.title: The Penultimate
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E26, David expresses his feelings for Donna by writing her a giant love note in the sand. Dylan graduates from California University. Matt considers moving to New York to help his sister-in-law raise her child.

programme.title: Ode to Joy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E27, After 10 years, the friends of 90210 say goodbye with a wedding, a reunion, and a few surprises! Just as Donna and David are joining together, Kelly's life is falling apart. Meanwhile, Steve and Janet make some major decisions about their future.

programme.title: Pilot Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E001, Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: The Green Room
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E002, Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: Every Dream Has Its Price
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E003, Brenda shops with Kelly and Tiffany and wishes she had their kind of money.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E004, Brandon is visited by his ex-girlfriend Sheryl but, when she meets Dylan, she's quickly star-struck by his money and glamor.

programme.title: One on One
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E005, When Brandon tries out for the basketball team, he's angered to learn that his main rival is from another district.

programme.title: Higher Education
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E006, An unreasonable teacher makes Brandon's life miserable by giving him no grade higher than a C.

programme.title: Perfect Mom
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E007, "Delusions of glamour" overcome Brenda when she meets Kelly's beautiful mother Jackie, a former model.

programme.title: Seventeen Year Itch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E008, The Walsh parents examine their relationship while Brenda and Brandon examine theirs, as they get involved in a UCLA study on twins.

programme.title: The Gentle Art Of Listening
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E009, Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.

programme.title: Isn't It Romantic?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E010, The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: B.Y.O.B.
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E011, Both Walsh twins face the temptation to drink alcohol when their peers are doing it all around them.

programme.title: One Man and a Baby
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E012, Brandon gets an unexpected taste of fatherhood when he asks his classmate Melissa for a date-then has to baby-sit her infant son while she has a college interview.

programme.title: The Killing Machine
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E22, Mitch goes undercover to stop an ex-Navy SEAL turned eco-terrorist from detonating a deadly underwater explosive device. When Mitch's dive gear floats to the surface, Sean and the team fear the worst.

programme.title: Soul Survivor
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E01, Sean clashes with Jenna. A new love triangle emerges between new recruit Zack and rookie hopeful Carrie, who’s more interested in Jason. Sean and new lifeguard Leigh Dwyer confront daredevil Cliff, whose dangerous antics disrupt the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Knife in the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E02, A teenager's waverunner causes accidents and his father threatens to sue Baywatch for not rescuing him ahead of his victims. JD takes out his personal problems on Sean. Zack relentlessly pursues Carrie while she pursues Jason.

programme.title: Bad Boyz
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E03, Sean and Jenna clash when she tries to close Baywatch so investors can develop the property. Carrie is afraid she's not lifeguard material after her reluctance to jump into the water from a hovering helicopter.

programme.title: Dangerous Games
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E04, Leigh goes hang gliding with Sam Parks, a daredevil pilot who puts her life in danger. Things go horribly wrong when Kekoa's cousin, Nani, parties on a boat with drunken frat boys and ends up alone in the ocean.

programme.title: Stone Cold
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E05, A plane carrying a donor's heart crashes, and it’s up to Jason to make a desperate dive to retrieve the heart before the patient dies. Two hooligans steal a car and end up trapped underwater. Jenna tries to get Leigh to turn against Sean.

programme.title: Broken Promises
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E06, To avoid jail, Danny joins Team Baywatch. Leigh doesn't trust him. Kekoa battles her father over her lifeguard career and moves out. JD, Zack, and Jason hustle two gorgeous women who turn out to be con artists who turn the tables on them.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E07, Jenna convinces ruthless Councilman McKenna to close the Training Center. Sean suspends Zack after he severely injures JD during a rescue. Kekoa expresses her deep love for JD – but to Leigh! Zack sees a ghostly woman from his dreams.

programme.title: The Cage
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E08, Sean confronts a "shark tour" operator dangerously dumping chum to lure sharks. A tourist who wants to be a hero to impress his son keeps interfering with Jason's rescues. JD and Kekoa try to keep their passionate relationship a secret.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E09, Sean's incredible guilt after a surfing accident leads to a crisis of faith. Zack has to choose between loyalty to his Baywatch teammates and his competitive ambitions.

programme.title: Ties that Bind
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E10, Zack is devastated when Sean promotes Carrie instead of him. Zack and Jason befriend a man and his teenage daughter who harbor a dangerous secret. Zack supplies a boat to escape to Maui, but disaster strikes before they get there.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E11, Leigh suspects Sasha, an attractive tourist, of murdering her husband. Betraying Leigh, Jason seduces Sasha with shocking results! Sean is shocked when he discovers the truth about his ex-wife's visit to Hawaii.

programme.title: Ex-Files
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E12, A series of fake rescue calls puts Sean, Jenna and Zack’s lives in danger. Jenna replaces Councilman McKenna, giving her the power to shut down the Training Center! JD tries to get Kekoa’s father to bless their relationship.

programme.title: The Stalker
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E13, Carrie rescues a spearfisherman who starts obsessively stalking her. Sean, Jason, and Zack save her from his deadly pursuit, but can Carrie feel safe saving strangers again? Sean is jealous of Sam dating Leigh, but Leigh has doubts about Sam.

programme.title: Father Faust
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E14, Baywatch faces two bizarre lawsuits. Kekoa’s father wants her to break up with JD and quit lifeguarding. Zack runs the new Junior Lifeguards program. A government Investigation puts Sean’s job and the future of the Training Center in jeopardy.

programme.title: Good Man in a Storm
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E15, A hurricane hits Hawaii. Sean and Jenna get trapped in a WWII bunker and must put their hatred aside and work together to escape. Zack is trapped in headquarters with a thrill-seeking reporter that puts their lives in danger to get her story.

programme.title: My Father the Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E16, Jenna invests all her money with an investment banker who turns out to be a con man. Derek Hart is the kind of man JD wishes he was. But when Derek jumps off a cliff, JD and Jason dive in to save his life, in more ways than one!
